findings: Physiologic uptake observed in brain, myocardium, and urinary tract.
No abnormal FDG uptake in the remaining organs.
Focal hypermetabolic activity noted in mediastinal lymph nodes with SUVmax 6.11.
Hypermetabolic lymph nodes noted in mediastinal lymph nodes, suggestive of malignancy.
Focal uptake in mediastinal lymph nodes consistent with post-surgical changes.
No abnormal activity in lungs or mediastinum.
recommendations: Clinical correlation recommended with prior imaging.
